title: "FAU studys how AI could impact sports recruiting"
excerpt: "While this might seem distant, the technology required for such advancements already exists in soccer. An app known as AI Scout allows soccer players to link their photos, videos, and statistics, providing recruiters with a comprehensive view. This demonstrates that the technology exists, it's just a matter of time before it comes to other sports."
